original_text: and to him Abraham apportioned a tenth part of everything. He is first, by translation of his name, king of righteousness, and then he is also king of Salem, that is, king of peace.
korean_text: 아브라함이 모든 것의 십분의 일을 그에게 나누어 주니라 그 이름을 해석하면 먼저는 의의 왕이요 그 다음은 살렘 왕이니 곧 평강의 왕이요

sentences.original_text: and to him Abraham apportioned a tenth part of everything.
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함은 그에게 모든 것의 십분의 일을 나누어 주었고

sentences.original_text: by translation of his name, king of righteousness,
and then he is also king of Salem,
